ComicInfo.Summary: Dark Future: In a hellish future earth the Anti-Pope rules the forces of evil. Then, the man once known as Daniel Llanso becomes the new "Hellspawn". Fueled by the rage of painful childhood memories, the new Hellspawn saves two refugees from the evil Desiccator. The two refugees, Madrid and Matthew, are terrorfied of their apparent savior but he seems to know them somehow.
